name: Natura (Megameca04)
description:
A dangerous tumor is growing in your brain, stop it!

(DISCLAIMER: We support the traditions of different people about using plants as medicine, but we doesn't support the use of natural medicine for serious diseases such as cancer and tumors. Please contact your doctor for more information.)

Plant the seeds and help them grow. Then cook, chop or just put them into the blender and drink the juice for stopping your brain from dying. (Plot twist: not all plants can be chopped or cooked.)

This game was made for the GoGodot Game Jam, whose theme was "growth".
